ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
OR( Mgmt_quality_Board_Comp_Factor__c < 0.85, Mgmt_quality_Board_Comp_Factor__c > 1.35)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mgmt Qualty / Board Comp (Factor) is not within the valid range
